src_original: oṁ namo bhagavate sarvva durgna (gta)
tipariśodhana rājāyatabhāgatāyārha tesamyakkaṁ buddhāya ||
takṣyathā ||  oṁ śodhaya 2 viśodhana 2 sarvvapāpaviśuddhe śuddhe viśuddhe sarvvakarmā varaṇa viśodhake svāhā ||
oṁ sarvvavinsa sarvvavaśāni viśodhīna hana 2 hyukaṭ ||  sarvavita hū ||
oṁ sarvavita kara ||
oṁ sarvvavit āḥ oṁ sarvvavita hū ||
oṁ sarvvavit jāṁtratrakaṭ ||
oṁ sarvvavit maghadīna pāramitā pūjehū ||
oṁ sarvva vitmahāvajodbhava vaśīla pāramitā pūjena hyū ||
oṁ (193) sarvvavita mahāpajodbha vakṣānti pāramitā pūjehū ||
oṁ sarvvavita mahāvajo dbhave vīryya pāramitā pūjeṁ troṁ ||
oṁ sarvva vita sarvvapāpa viśodhanidharmma dhyāna pāramitā pūje hū phaṭ ||
oṁ sarvva vitasarvva dugnatipa riśodhanirāja phreśopakre śoccheda nipṛṣyāva laukinī prajñāḥ pāramitā pūjeṁtrāṁ |
oṁ sarvvavit sarvvapāpa viśodhani jñānāna lokinī praṇidhi pāramitā pūje hiṁ hū phaṭ ||
oṁ namo bhagavate sarvvadurgmapari śodhanarājā yatabhāgatāyārha te samyakakṣaṁ buddhāya ||
tatyathā ||
oṁ śodhanera sarvvapāpaviśodhane śuddha viśuddhe sarvvakarmmāvaraṇaviśuddhe svāhā ||
namaste vajoṣṇīṣāya dharmādhātū svabhāvaka sarvvasatvehitārthāya ātmatatva pradeśakaḥ oṁ namaste va ratnoṣṇī samantātva ta bhāva nematraidhātukaskita sarvvaṁ abhiṣekapradāyakaḥ ||
oṁ namaste padamoṣloṣāya svabhāvapratyavekṣaṇaḥ ||
āśvāsayati satveṣudharmmāmṛta pravarṣaṇe ||
